Scan your eyes with AreUnemia to get a quick anemia check, then answer a few health questions for better accuracy.
Remember, this is just a preliminary checkâ€” always consult a healthcare professional for a confirmed diagnosis.
Start scanning now to stay proactive about your health!
Do you often feel tired or fatigued, even after getting enough sleep?
Do you notice that your skin tone, particularly on your face or palms, is paler than usual?
Do you experience shortness of breath or rapid heartbeat, especially during physical activity?
Do you have frequent episodes of dizziness or lightheadedness, particularly when standing up quickly?
Do you often feel tired or fatigued, even after getting enough sleep?
Do you often experience intense headaches, particularly ones that seem to come on suddenly or persist for long periods?
Have you noticed a significant change in your appetite, such as a decreased desire to eat or unusual cravings for non-food items?
Have you been feeling more irritable or moody than usual, without any obvious cause?
Do you experience numbness or tingling sensations, particularly in your hands or feet?
Have you noticed any changes in your nail beds, such as pale or spoon-shaped nails?

Seek immediate medical attention. Treatment may include iron supplements, vitamins, dietary changes, or blood transfusions. It\'s crucial to follow your doctor\'s advice to manage symptoms and improve your health.

Consult with a healthcare professional for advice, which may include dietary changes, iron supplements, or other treatments. Focus on iron-rich foods and consider vitamin C for better absorption. Pace yourself and avoid strenuous activities to manage symptoms like fatigue.

Adjust your diet to include iron-rich foods like spinach and lentils, and consider vitamin C sources for better absorption. Iron supplements could help, but consult a healthcare professional first. Monitor symptoms like fatigue and weakness, seek medical advice if they persist.

Focus on a balanced diet with iron-rich foods like lean meats and leafy greens. Stay hydrated and exercise regularly for overall well-being. If experiencing fatigue or weakness, consult a healthcare professional to rule out other health issues. Regular check-ups help maintain optimal health.
